## RequestManager.shh\_getMessages property

Get all messages matching a filter. Unlike shh\_getFilterChanges this returns all messages.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
shh_getMessages: (filterId: Data) => Promise<Array<SHHFilterMessage>>;
```
